summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the acquisition of an easement for sanitary sewer purposes across certain property in Block 1, Minor's Addition, Blocks 101 and 102, Seattle Tide Lands, and Government Lot 4, Section 22, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W.M., and making an appropriation from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund therefor.
